sinks.name: addressesErrors
sinks.description: Gathered Addresses with errors, if an address fails exists checks it may appear more than once

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		address_id as long,
		address_type as string,
		address1 as string,
		address2 as string,
		address3 as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		zipcode as string,
		phone as string,
		email as string,
		Fax as string,
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Addresses
source(output(
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CityStateCountry
AddressesWna assert(expectTrue(!isNull(address_id), false, 'addressIdNotNull', null, 'Address Id is null'),
	expectTrue(lower(address_type) == 'residence' || lower(address_type) == 'business', false, 'addressTypeValid', null, "Address is not residence or business"),
	expectTrue(address1 != "", false, 'address1NotBlank', null, 'Address1 is blank'),
	expectTrue(isInteger(zipcode), false, 'zipcodeNumeric', null, "Zipcode is not numeric"),
	expectTrue(length(toString(phone)) == 11, false, 'phoneNumberNot11digits', null, toString(phone) + " Invalid Phone number length"),
	expectTrue(regexMatch(email, `^\w+([-+.']\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)*\.\w+([-.]\w+)*$`), false, 'validEmail', null, email + " is an invalid email"),
	expectTrue(length(toString(Fax)) == 11, false, 'FaxNumberNot11digits', null, toString(Fax) + " Invalid Phone number length")) ~> AddressesValidation
AddressesValidation derive(address1 = upper(address1),
		address2 = upper(address2),
		address3 = upper(address3),
		address_type = initCap(address_type),
		phone = substring(phone, 1, 1) + "-" + substring(phone, 2, 3) + "-" + substring(phone, 5, 3) + "-" + substring(phone, 8, 4),
		Fax = substring(Fax, 1, 1) + "-" + substring(Fax, 2, 3) + "-" + substring(Fax, 5, 3) + "-" + substring(Fax, 8, 4)) ~> AddressesTransformation
Addresses derive(address1 = iif(isNull(address1), "N/A", address1),
		address2 = iif(isNull(address2), "N/A", address2),
		address3 = iif(isNull(address3), "N/A", address3)) ~> AddressesWna
AddressesTransformation filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
AddressesTransformation, Customers exists(Addresses@customer_id == Customers@customer_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerIDExists
Filter1, CustomerIDExists union(byName: true)~> Union1
AddressesTransformation, CityStateCountry exists(Addresses@city == CityStateCountry@City
	&& Addresses@state == CityStateCountry@State
	&& Addresses@country == CityStateCountry@Country,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CityStateCountryExists
Union1, CityStateCountryExists union(byName: true)~> Union2
AddressesTransformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AddressesClean
Union2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 0) ~> addressesErrors
